corrected_solution:
On Sunday he takes 2 hours to get there because 4 / 2 = 2
This takes him 120 minutes because 2 x 60 = 120
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him .4 hours to get to the store because 4 / 10 = .4
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him 24 minutes to get to the store because .4 x 60 = 24
In total it takes him 168 minutes to get to the store because 120 + 24 + 24 = 168
On average it takes him 56 minutes because 168 / 3 = 56
#### 56
corrected_explanation: Step 5 first erroneously references the result 100 instead of 120 from step 2, resulting in the calculation of 100+24+24=148 instead of 120+24+24=168. This affects the calculation of 148/3=49.3 instead of 168/3=56 in step 6, resulting in an error in the final result.

corrected_solution:
On Sunday he takes 2 hours to get there because 4 / 2 = 2
This takes him 120 minutes because 2 x 60 = 120
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him .4 hours to get to the store because 4 / 10 = .4
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him 24 minutes to get to the store because .4 x 60 = 24
In total it takes him 168 minutes to get to the store because 120 + 24 + 24 = 168
On average it takes him 56 minutes because 168 / 3 = 56
#### 56
corrected_explanation: Step 6 first erroneously references the result 138 instead of 168 from step 2, resulting in the calculation of 138 / 3 = 46 instead of 168 / 3 = 56. And this causes an error in the final result.
